insidersStatus.eligibleText:
**Functional Purpose**: Message displayed to users who are eligible for Insiders.
**UI Location**: Insiders Status component (main status message)
**When Users See This**: When their Insiders status is 'eligible'.
**Technical Context**: Part of a status object, rendered dynamically.
**Current English**: "You're currently eligible for Insiders. Thank you for being part of Exercism. We're excited to continue with you on our journey!"
insidersStatus.ineligibleText:
**Functional Purpose**: Message displayed to users who are ineligible for Insiders.
**UI Location**: Insiders Status component (main status message)
**When Users See This**: When their Insiders status is 'ineligible'.
**Technical Context**: Part of a status object, rendered dynamically.
**Current English**: "Set up a recurring monthly donation of $10 or more to access Insiders"
insidersStatus.eligibleLifetimeText:
**Functional Purpose**: Message displayed to users with lifetime Insiders access.
**UI Location**: Insiders Status component (main status message)
**When Users See This**: When their Insiders status is 'eligible_lifetime'.
**Technical Context**: Part of a status object, rendered dynamically.
**Current English**: "We've given you lifetime access to Insiders. Thank you for being part of Exercism. We're excited to continue with you on our journey!"
insidersStatus.unsetText:
**Functional Purpose**: Message displayed while Insiders status is being calculated.
**UI Location**: Insiders Status component (main status message)
**When Users See This**: When their Insiders status is 'unset'.
**Technical Context**: Part of a status object, rendered dynamically.
**Current English**: "We're currently calculating your Insiders status. This box will update once we've finished."
insidersStatus.getAccessToInsiders:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to activate Insiders access.
**UI Location**: Insiders Status component (action button)
**When Users See This**: When the user is eligible for Insiders but has not yet activated it.
**Technical Context**: Standard text for a button.
**Current English**: "Get access to Insiders"
insidersStatus.donateToAccessInsiders:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to encourage donation for Insiders access.
**UI Location**: Insiders Status component (action button)
**When Users See This**: When the user is ineligible for Insiders.
**Technical Context**: Standard text for a button.
**Current English**: "Donate to Exercism to access Insiders"
insidersStatus.chooseMonthlyDonation:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the section where users choose their monthly donation amount.
**UI Location**: Insiders donation modal (section heading)
**When Users See This**: When setting up a donation via the modal.
**Technical Context**: Standard text for a heading.
**Current English**: "1. Choose your monthly donation:"
insidersStatus.specifyAmount:
**Functional Purpose**: Placeholder text for the custom donation amount input field.
**UI Location**: Insiders donation modal (amount input field)
**When Users See This**: When typing into the custom amount input.
**Technical Context**: Placeholder for an input field.
**Current English**: "Specify amount"
insidersStatus.minimumDonationAmount:
**Functional Purpose**: Error message indicating the minimum required donation amount for Insiders.
**UI Location**: Insiders donation modal (below custom amount input)
**When Users See This**: When a user enters a donation amount less than $10 or an invalid amount.
**Technical Context**: Error message displayed conditionally.
**Current English**: "Please note: The minimum donation amount for Insiders Access is $10.00. Thank you for your kind support!"
insidersStatus.choosePaymentMethod:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the section where users choose their payment method.
**UI Location**: Insiders donation modal (section heading)
**When Users See This**: When setting up a donation via the modal.
**Technical Context**: Standard text for a heading.
**Current English**: "2. Choose your payment method:"
insidersStatus.thankYou:
**Functional Purpose**: Main heading in the Insiders donation modal.
**UI Location**: Insiders donation modal (modal header)
**When Users See This**: When the donation modal is opened.
**Technical Context**: Standard text for a heading.
**Current English**: "Thank you!"
insidersStatus.thankYouForSupport:
**Functional Purpose**: Introductory message thanking users for their support.
**UI Location**: Insiders donation modal (modal header)
**When Users See This**: When the donation modal is opened.
**Technical Context**: Standard paragraph text.
**Current English**: "Thank you so much for supporting Exercism. It means the world to us! ðŸ’œ"
insidersStatus.setUpMonthlyDonation:
**Functional Purpose**: Instructions on how to set up the monthly donation and where to manage it.
**UI Location**: Insiders donation modal (modal header)
**When Users See This**: When the donation modal is opened.
**Technical Context**: Standard paragraph text.
**Current English**: "Please use the form below to set up your monthly donation. You can amend or cancel your donation at any time in your settings page."
insidersStatus.donationsImprovePlatform:
**Functional Purpose**: Legal/informational disclaimer about Exercism's non-profit status and use of donations.
**UI Location**: Insiders donation modal (modal footer)
**When Users See This**: At the bottom of the donation modal.
**Technical Context**: Standard paragraph text, explaining the purpose of donations.
**Current English**: "Exercism is an independent not-for-profit organisation. All donations are used to run and improve the platform. All payments are securely handled by Stripe."
